title: Medical Student Learning Assessment Design Based on Structured Clinical Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical knowledge and foundational clinical practice skills
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment integrating severe patient management simulations and Objective Structured Clinical Examination (OSCE) evaluation systems

learning_goals: Students can comprehensively analyze patient conditions according to ICU scenarios and perform appropriate interventions with over 80% accuracy.
Students achieve at least three out of five stages in the collaboration and data request process with nurses during OSCE stations.
Students achieve at least 3 out of 4 points on response quality (communication, clinical judgment, technical performance) based on a rubric when using simulation equipment.

resources: Recording equipment and video analysis software for assessment

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
